Title: Enacts the New York artificial intelligence bill of rights
Summary: Enacts the New York artificial intelligence bill of rights to provide residents of the state with rights and protections to ensure that any system making decisions without human intervention impacting their lives do so lawfully, properly, and with meaningful oversight.
LawCode: Add Art IV §§401 - 409, St Tech L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state technology law, in relation to enacting the New York artificial intelligence bill of rights
